content.prompt: Pitt’s speech regarding the possibility of peace with France was most likely influenced by which of the following developments?

choices.label: Napoleon’s military victories over rival continental powers and assumption of political leadership in France
Great Britain’s weakness in naval power relative to the naval power of France
Pitt’s concern over the possibility of France gaining allies outside of Europe
The physically destructive effects of the war against France on the territory of the British Isles

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
